allow:
Bash(printf "
🔍 App launched, you should see console logs now. Try:
1. Click ''New Game''
2. Create a game
3. Go to Home tab
4. Click ''Save Game''
5. Go back to main menu
6. Click ''Load Game''

Check Console.app for logs with 🎮, 📂, 🎯, 🏠, and 🔘 emojis
")

Bash(printf "📱 Opening Xcode to manually add LoadAGameView.swift to the project.

In Xcode:
1. Right-click on the ''Views'' folder in the project navigator
2. Choose ''Add Files to FranchiseManager''
3. Navigate to and select LoadAGameView.swift
4. Make sure it''s added to the FranchiseManager target
5. Build the project (Cmd+B)

This will properly include the file in the build.
")
